text:
FMG Suite | Senior Software Engineer ASP.NET MVC / C# $80-100k | Minnesota/Wisconsin

We're hiring for senior .net engineers. If you have 5-10 years of experience, like to be on a fast-paced team, but have a good work/life balance, you might be a great fit.

Beyond the regular ASP.NET MVC, C#, SQL experience, we are looking for someone with strong frontend js experience, good AWS knowledge, and has a passion for improving coding practices and unit testing.

We are a growing company that has a remote-first dev team that is based mostly in the MN and WI areas. We get work done and have fun doing it. Come join us!

Apply at https://fmgsuite.com/fmg-careers/
